Issue.creator: rpjday
Issue.summary: Platform-specific binary Makefile rules are inconsistent in use of ".PHONY"
Issue.description: In the top-level Makefile, three of the platform-specific binaries (peer, orderer and configtxgen) are defined as PHONY targets, while the remaining two (configtxlator and cryptogen) aren't. They should all be defined consistently as PHONY, just for uniformity.
